attributes.action: HELP PEOPLE WITH FIXED RATE MORGAGES SMALL BUISNESS NEED HELP NOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I BRIAN ROBERTSON HAVE BEEN INSALING HEATING FOR 5 YEARS FOR THE WORMFRONT SCHEME BEING LAID OFF AABPLUMBINGANDHEATING@HOT MAIL .CO.UK    I CONTRACT TO IGUANA IE EAGA I ALL SO I HAVE A FIXED RATE MORGAGE SO INTREST CUTS ARE NOT HELLPING ME AT ALL I HAVE NEVER CLAMED 1 P OF BENEFITS FROM LEAVING SCHOOL HO ARE YOU HELPINGNOT ME NOT ME

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
Please remove the email address from your petition.
Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
